participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and optimistic, always looking for the bright side of life.
participant_1.background: She grew up in a small town and moved to the city for work, where she enjoys exploring new cafes and meeting new people.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and analytical, often taking a moment to reflect before responding.
participant_2.background: He has a background in engineering and loves hiking on weekends to unwind from his busy city life.
